QuestData.Title: Idolatry
QuestData.Description: Zhere is somezhink I need handled, $r.$b$bMy most trusted advisor has run afoul of an ancient curse. A hex zhat has transformed zhe man into a turkey, of all zhings!$b$bI haff studied for days to discover a remedy for his condition, and finally I am ready to conduct zhe ritual.$b$bI vill reqvire several idols from zhe nearby ruins. You are to brink zhem to me at vonce!$b$bDismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Schnottz wants you to collect 8 Well-preserved Idols.
QuestData.CompletionText: Haff you brought me zhe idols, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Zhese look to be of sufficient quality.$b$bVizh zhese, ve are vone shtep closah to zhe cleansink ritual.
